attributes.action: save the Royal Mail as a public service, free from ownership by private business
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Royal Mail exists as a service to the British public, to hand parts of it over to private businesses would be to change its focus from service to profit making and would be to the detriment of the British people. It is extraordinary that the government is trying to convince us that profit making companies could run Royal Mail more effficiently than if it is run as a service,with any profit being able to be reinvested back into the service.
